title: Inquisitor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Frame a player at night.
- Shroud a Hallow member during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Framed players will return unfavorable results to all Investigative abilities: they will appear to be random existing evil in the game to Consigliere, appear to visit a dead player to a Tracker or Lookout, have the word “kill” to the Zoltar, etc. You will gain a Faith point for every Investigative ability used against a Framed player.
- Shrouding a Hallow member will make them detection immune for the night. You will gain a Faith point for every Investigative ability activated against a shrouded Hallow member.
- Shrouding Hallow members *also* astralizes their visits. Gain a Faith Point for every ability the astralization allowed them to avoid.
- When you have accumulated 2 Faith points, the Saint will gain a Saint point.
- If no Investigative roles are in the game, reroll this slot to another Hallow role.
